tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hackers_login_credentials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE stolen_credentials (
    credential_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_id UUID,
    username STRING,
    password STRING,
    FOREIGN KEY (hacker_id) REFERENCES hackers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE phishing_attacks (
    attack_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attack_date DATE,
    hacker_id INT,
    victim_email VARCHAR(255),
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE phishing_attempts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_id INT NOT NULL,
    victim_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phishing_url VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    attempt_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE phishing_emails (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email_from VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email_to VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email_subject VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    email_body TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE stolen_credentials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_id INT NOT NULL,
    username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date_stolen TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE hacker_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hacker_id INT NOT NULL,
    action_performed VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    log_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    log_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW()
);
